name: Achuthan Chari
review:
Bad management which looks to only bill patients.
Understood my father's case only to decline when they realised it was a not worth too much of a billing.
They declined citing no rooms after hearing the entire case.
Very unfortunate that patient's health is not giving any consideration. Looks like they are now a money making scheme post listing their company on the exchanges
feedback1: the patient or relative encountered poor management.
feedback2: the patient or relative's father's case was declined due to low billing potential.
feedback3: the patient or relative's health was not considered by the hospital.

name: sushil chitkara
review:
Wonderful,  Thoughtful ABHA scanner service at  jupiter hospital
I will refer to all of my friends.
All the best.
Keep going
GRE staff very attentive says and  helpful staff .
feedback1: the patient or relative had a wonderful experience with the ABHA scanner service.
feedback2: All the best to Jupiter Hospital.
feedback3: the patient or relative appreciated the attentive and helpful staff.

name: Navanath
review: best sapporting staff
feedback1: the patient or relative received excellent care.

name: Rucha Shinde
review: Worst hospital ever, being a doctor i felt this!!! Why cannot the family member take tiffin inside??? This people have not designated any area outside hospital to have meal than why cannot you allow tiffin!! Also the pass thing is very irritating!! And these people are charging very high prices!!
feedback1: the patient or relative had a terrible experience at the hospital.
feedback2: the patient or relative felt frustrated because family members were not allowed to bring meals inside.
feedback3: the patient or relative found the hospital's pass system very annoying.

name: Prax
review:
putting this review up with a lot of responsibility. stay away from this hospital. the doctors and equipment might be top notch, but the money mindedness of the ownership and the customer service department is absolutely bordering on inhuman. i had the most terrible experience during my parent's hospitalization here, so much so that it is almost a trauma, and i have woved never to even look in the direction of Jupiter hospital. during a health crisis what one needs apart from healtcare is empathy, and this hospital looks at you just as one walking ATM, and the way they hound you if you are even a few hours late in payment is almost like vasooli. I don't want to take names here, but the department for billing is worthy of working for the mob.

Go for hospitals where they have a little humanity in their veins.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a very difficult experience at Jupiter Hospital.
feedback2: the patient or relative felt that the customer service was extremely unkind.
feedback3: the patient or relative regretted choosing Jupiter Hospital for their parent's care.

name: Saurabh Tyagi
review: Customer care response is pathetic.
feedback1: the patient or relative received poor customer care.

name: Tanishka Vispute
review: My mom is admitted there and she wanted me and my 12 yr sis to be with her but as it was 2 pm they did not let both of us in. Atleast they should leave kids inside. Somehow my sister is with her and I am sitting in lobby since hour.

name: POONAM SHAH
review:
Must say Sumit sir was very very helpful I was clueless with few things but he helped me with all the stuff.
Thanks a lot Sumit Sir!
feedback1: the patient or relative found Sumit sir to be very helpful.
feedback2: the patient or relative felt clueless about some things initially.
feedback3: Sumit sir assisted the patient or relative with everything needed.

name: Kavita Singh
review: GRE team did my admission. Miss Rajshree is very genuine,polite, and very cooperative person.
feedback1: Miss Rajshree was very genuine, polite, and cooperative.

name: sandra bhosale
review: The hospital is very good. The staff and doctors were very helpful and polite.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a very good experience at the hospital.
feedback2: the patient or relative found the staff and doctors to be very helpful and polite.

name: Bhavana Deshmukh
review: Jupiter hospitals has best staff, who are cooperative and caring. Recently my mother-in-law had to undergo an operation. Ms. Pooja Shinde from marketing department supported me to get all the formalities done and guided us. Thanking you Ms. Pooja from the bottom of my heart.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a great experience at Jupiter hospitals.
feedback2: the patient or relative received excellent care from the hospital's staff.
feedback3: Ms. Pooja Shinde from the marketing department helped the patient or relative with all the formalities and guidance.

name: navin agrawal
review: Entire process from admission , treatment nursing caring and discharge was smooth . I liked smooth admission process as it is as taken care by staff very nicely.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a smooth admission process.
feedback2: the patient or relative received excellent nursing care.

name: Shuvayu Mukherjee
review: I have visited Jupiter Hospital many times for various reasons. I have always found the staff helpful. It is costliest than other hospitals but the service and care justifies it.
feedback1: the patient or relative has always found the staff at Jupiter Hospital helpful.
feedback2: the patient or relative considers the service and care at Jupiter Hospital worth the higher cost.

name: sneha bandal
review: Earlier it was a good hospital but currently they have become more unprofessional and unsupportive.had one of the worst experience at jupiter hospital.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a poor experience at Jupiter Hospital.
feedback2: the patient or relative felt unsupported by the staff.

name: Vinay Mhatre
review: Service is excellent and staff is very helpful. Seamless system and patient is taken well care of
feedback1: the patient or relative had an excellent service.
feedback2: the patient or relative was taken well care of.

name: suhas kadam
review:
I have been visiting jupiter for more than 15 years..and had a very good experience except the recent one where I was hopping high for the critical illness of my dad for which we visited Dr.Manish Chandra Oncologist due to him entire  15 years good experience had for jupiter...ruined...he is very egoistic doctor and unprofessional...we visited him for 2nd opinion post treatment at other hospitals due to location issue...we paid consultation ...but he took it to his ego and denied consultation ....

Avoid this doctor if you don't want to get fooled by some egoistic doctor
feedback1: the patient or relative had a very good experience at Jupiter.

name: Ketaki Sane
review:
Jupiter absolutely owns 'Patient First' - every person right from the liftman to nursing staff to mavshis are very warm and caring. And ofcrs the backbone, all doctors! I was here for my delivery and I felt at home, never seen such warm and caring people at any other hospital. Thank you and grateful for the delivery experience. Salute!

Dr. Manasi Gore ma'am is so reassuring, she's the best gynaecologist and a kind human. Would like to mention some names from nursing staff like Anjali, Shivani, Suvarna, Minu etc they felt like my sisters the way they were handling everything my baby so efficiently!

Tons of best wishes and very grateful!!!
feedback1: the patient or relative felt warmly cared for by everyone from the liftman to the nursing staff.
feedback2: the patient or relative was reassured by Dr. Manasi Gore ma'am, who is described as the best gynaecologist and a kind human.

name: Sapna Keswani
review: Good
feedback1: the patient or relative had a good experience.

name: randhir yadav
review:
Very nice and co-operative staff..
Neurologist Dr. Yogesh godge best doctor I've ever seen for epilepsy..
feedback1: the patient or relative had a very nice and cooperative staff.
feedback2: Dr. Yogesh Godge was the best doctor the patient or relative has ever seen for epilepsy.

name: Tuku Roy
review: Overall good. However, facilities for relatives of ICU patients are limited. Dormitory accommodation with common toilets. No bathrooms or privacy for changing clothes or taking baths. Considering a relative is always needed to be present, better facilities would be appreciated
feedback1: Overall, the patient or relative had a good experience.
feedback2: However, the facilities for relatives of ICU patients were limited.
feedback3: Specifically, dormitory accommodation with common toilets was available.

name: ShashiKant Bharti
review: Dr Raman Umralkar is very best
feedback1: Dr Raman Umralkar is considered by the patient or relative to be the most excellent.

name: Neetu Fernandes

name: Dimple Jittu w8
review: Very bad service in house keeping and in room dinning.staffs very rude specially lady in the pantry and delivery boys dont listen atall.house keeping people just throw the clothes bedsheets and move don't change till we keep them calling for 10 times

name: Ankit Singh
review:
I would give 1 star.
It was our first visit with Dr. Padma Menon, the dr.not even talking to the patients and charges high consultation fees apart from that it took more than 1 hour even after taking an prior appointment and she had not giving a proper explanation of disease or diet to follow nothing just charging high fees and playing with people emotions.
Save your time and money by not visiting this hospital.
feedback1: the patient or relative had a very poor experience.
feedback2: Dr. Padma Menon did not communicate effectively with the patients.
feedback3: The hospital charged high fees despite providing little to no value.

name: Sailendra Praharaj
review:
My self and my wife got Health checkup done  at Jupiter Hospital start sep 24. Starting from the appointment, confirmation and front desk services, the total process was organized and completed within 4 hrs. The doctors. Techinicians and help start were at the service. A shoutout for the best complimentary breakfast to all is well appreciated.

Thankyou health checkup team
feedback1: the patient or relative had a positive experience during their health checkup.
feedback2: The front desk services were organized and efficient.
